structure.unit: B FERTILIZER AND PESTICIDE USE AND APPLICATION

law.text: All fees collected by the department from structural pest control operators for licensing and examinations shall be deposited in the State Treasury to the credit of a revolving fund for the use of the department in enforcing the provisions of KRS 217B.515 to 217B.585 and for the expense of carrying out the duties and functions of the Pest Control Advisory Board.
law.history: Created 1978 Ky. Acts ch. 81, sec. 17, effective June 17, 1978.

metadata.budget-ref: See State/Executive Branch Budget, 2014 Ky. Acts ch. 117, Pt. I, A, 22, (1) at 618.
